43#define QP_IMPL // this is QP implementation
44#include "qp_port.hpp" // QP port
45#include "qp_pkg.hpp" // QP package-scope interface
46#include "qsafe.h" // QP Functional Safety (FuSa) Subsystem
47#ifdef Q_SPY // QS software tracing enabled?
48 #include "qs_port.hpp" // QS port

50#else
51 #include "qs_dummy.hpp" // disable the QS software tracing

62// top-state object for QMsm-style state machines
63QP::QMState const l_msm_top_s = {
64 nullptr,
65 nullptr,
66 nullptr,
67 nullptr,
68 nullptr
69};
70
71static constexpr std::int_fast8_t MAX_ENTRY_DEPTH_ {4};
72
73} // unnamed namespace

85//$define${QEP::QMsm} vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv

88//${QEP::QMsm} ...............................................................
89
90//${QEP::QMsm::QMsm} .........................................................
91QMsm::QMsm(QStateHandler const initial) noexcept
92 : QAsm()
93{
94 m_state.obj = &l_msm_top_s; // the current state (top)
95 m_temp.fun = initial; // the initial tran. handler
96}
97
98//${QEP::QMsm::init} .........................................................
99void QMsm::init(
100 void const * const e,
101 std::uint_fast8_t const qs_id)
102{
103 #ifndef Q_SPY
104 Q_UNUSED_PAR(qs_id);
105 #endif
106
107 QF_CRIT_STAT
108 QF_CRIT_ENTRY();
109 Q_REQUIRE_INCRIT(200, (m_temp.fun != nullptr)
110 && (m_state.obj == &l_msm_top_s));
111 QF_CRIT_EXIT();
112
113 // execute the top-most initial tran.
114 QState r = (*m_temp.fun)(this, Q_EVT_CAST(QEvt));
115
116 QF_CRIT_ENTRY();
117 // the top-most initial tran. must be taken
118 Q_ASSERT_INCRIT(210, r == Q_RET_TRAN_INIT);
119
120 QS_MEM_SYS();
121 QS_BEGIN_PRE_(QS_QEP_STATE_INIT, qs_id)
122 QS_OBJ_PRE_(this); // this state machine object
123 QS_FUN_PRE_(m_state.obj->stateHandler); // source state
124 QS_FUN_PRE_(m_temp.tatbl->target->stateHandler); // target state
125 QS_END_PRE_()
126 QS_MEM_APP();
127
128 QF_CRIT_EXIT();
129
130 // set state to the last tran. target
131 m_state.obj = m_temp.tatbl->target;
132
133 // drill down into the state hierarchy with initial transitions...
134 do {
135 // execute the tran. table
136 r = execTatbl_(m_temp.tatbl, qs_id);
137 } while (r >= Q_RET_TRAN_INIT);
138
139 QS_CRIT_ENTRY();
140 QS_MEM_SYS();
141 QS_BEGIN_PRE_(QS_QEP_INIT_TRAN, qs_id)
142 QS_TIME_PRE_(); // time stamp
143 QS_OBJ_PRE_(this); // this state machine object
144 QS_FUN_PRE_(m_state.obj->stateHandler); // the new current state
145 QS_END_PRE_()
146 QS_MEM_APP();
147 QS_CRIT_EXIT();
148
149 #ifndef Q_UNSAFE
150 m_temp.uint = ~m_state.uint;
151 #endif
152}
153
154//${QEP::QMsm::dispatch} .....................................................
155void QMsm::dispatch(
156 QEvt const * const e,
157 std::uint_fast8_t const qs_id)
158{
159 #ifndef Q_SPY
160 Q_UNUSED_PAR(qs_id);
161 #endif
162
163 QMState const *s = m_state.obj; // store the current state
164 QMState const *t = s;
165
166 QF_CRIT_STAT
167 QF_CRIT_ENTRY();
168 Q_REQUIRE_INCRIT(300, (s != nullptr)
169 && (m_state.uint == static_cast<std::uintptr_t>(~m_temp.uint)));
170 Q_REQUIRE_INCRIT(302, QEvt::verify_(e));
171
172 QS_MEM_SYS();
173 QS_BEGIN_PRE_(QS_QEP_DISPATCH, qs_id)
174 QS_TIME_PRE_(); // time stamp
175 QS_SIG_PRE_(e->sig); // the signal of the event
176 QS_OBJ_PRE_(this); // this state machine object
177 QS_FUN_PRE_(s->stateHandler); // the current state handler
178 QS_END_PRE_()
179 QS_MEM_APP();
180
181 QF_CRIT_EXIT();
182
183 // scan the state hierarchy up to the top state...
184 QState r;
185 do {
186 r = (*t->stateHandler)(this, e); // call state handler function
187
188 // event handled? (the most frequent case)
189 if (r >= Q_RET_HANDLED) {
190 break; // done scanning the state hierarchy
191 }
192 // event unhandled and passed to the superstate?
193 else if (r == Q_RET_SUPER) {
194 t = t->superstate; // advance to the superstate
195 }
196 // event unhandled and passed to a submachine superstate?
197 else if (r == Q_RET_SUPER_SUB) {
198 t = m_temp.obj; // current host state of the submachie
199 }
200 else { // event unhandled due to a guard?
201 QF_CRIT_ENTRY();
202 // event must be unhandled due to a guard evaluating to 'false'
203 Q_ASSERT_INCRIT(310, r == Q_RET_UNHANDLED);
204
205 QS_MEM_SYS();
206 QS_BEGIN_PRE_(QS_QEP_UNHANDLED, qs_id)
207 QS_SIG_PRE_(e->sig); // the signal of the event
208 QS_OBJ_PRE_(this); // this state machine object
209 QS_FUN_PRE_(t->stateHandler); // the current state
210 QS_END_PRE_()
211 QS_MEM_APP();
212
213 QF_CRIT_EXIT();
214
215 t = t->superstate; // advance to the superstate
216 }
217 } while (t != nullptr);
218
219 if (r >= Q_RET_TRAN) { // any kind of tran. taken?
220 #ifdef Q_SPY
221 QMState const * const ts = t; // transition source for QS tracing
222
223 QF_CRIT_ENTRY();
224 // the tran. source state must not be nullptr
225 Q_ASSERT_INCRIT(320, ts != nullptr);
226 QF_CRIT_EXIT();
227 #endif // Q_SPY
228
229 do {
230 // save the tran-action table before it gets clobbered
231 QMTranActTable const * const tatbl = m_temp.tatbl;
232 QAsmAttr tmp; // temporary to save intermediate values
233
234 // was TRAN, TRAN_INIT, or TRAN_EP taken?
235 if (r <= Q_RET_TRAN_EP) {
236 m_temp.obj = nullptr; // clear
237 exitToTranSource_(s, t, qs_id);
238 r = execTatbl_(tatbl, qs_id);
239 s = m_state.obj;
240 }
241 // was a tran. segment to history taken?
242 else if (r == Q_RET_TRAN_HIST) {
243 tmp.obj = m_state.obj; // save history
244 m_state.obj = s; // restore the original state
245 exitToTranSource_(s, t, qs_id);
246 static_cast<void>(execTatbl_(tatbl, qs_id));
247 r = enterHistory_(tmp.obj, qs_id);
248 s = m_state.obj;
249 }
250 else {
251 QF_CRIT_ENTRY();
252 // must be tran. to exit point
253 Q_ASSERT_INCRIT(340, r == Q_RET_TRAN_XP);
254 QF_CRIT_EXIT();
255
256 tmp.act = m_state.act; // save XP action
257 m_state.obj = s; // restore the original state
258 r = (*tmp.act)(this); // execute the XP action
259 if (r == Q_RET_TRAN) { // XP -> TRAN ?
260 #ifdef Q_SPY
261 tmp.tatbl = m_temp.tatbl; // save m_temp
262 #endif // Q_SPY
263 exitToTranSource_(s, t, qs_id);
264 // take the tran-to-XP segment inside submachine
265 static_cast<void>(execTatbl_(tatbl, qs_id));
266 s = m_state.obj;
267 #ifdef Q_SPY
268 m_temp.tatbl = tmp.tatbl; // restore m_temp
269 #endif // Q_SPY
270 }
271 else if (r == Q_RET_TRAN_HIST) { // XP -> HIST ?
272 tmp.obj = m_state.obj; // save the history
273 m_state.obj = s; // restore the original state
274 #ifdef Q_SPY
275 s = m_temp.obj; // save m_temp
276 #endif // Q_SPY
277 exitToTranSource_(m_state.obj, t, qs_id);
278 // take the tran-to-XP segment inside submachine
279 static_cast<void>(execTatbl_(tatbl, qs_id));
280 #ifdef Q_SPY
281 m_temp.obj = s; // restore m_temp
282 #endif // Q_SPY
283 s = m_state.obj;
284 m_state.obj = tmp.obj; // restore the history
285 }
286 else {
287 QF_CRIT_ENTRY();
288 // TRAN_XP must NOT be followed by any other tran type
289 Q_ASSERT_INCRIT(330, r < Q_RET_TRAN);
290 QF_CRIT_EXIT();
291 }
292 }
293
294 t = s; // set target to the current state
295
296 } while (r >= Q_RET_TRAN);
297
298 QS_CRIT_ENTRY();
299 QS_MEM_SYS();
300 QS_BEGIN_PRE_(QS_QEP_TRAN, qs_id)
301 QS_TIME_PRE_(); // time stamp
302 QS_SIG_PRE_(e->sig); // the signal of the event
303 QS_OBJ_PRE_(this); // this state machine object
304 QS_FUN_PRE_(ts->stateHandler); // the tran. source
305 QS_FUN_PRE_(s->stateHandler); // the new active state
306 QS_END_PRE_()
307 QS_MEM_APP();
308 QS_CRIT_EXIT();
309 }
310
311 #ifdef Q_SPY
312 // was the event handled?
313 else if (r == Q_RET_HANDLED) {
314 QF_CRIT_ENTRY();
315 // internal tran. source can't be nullptr
316 Q_ASSERT_INCRIT(340, t != nullptr);
317
318 QS_MEM_SYS();
319 QS_BEGIN_PRE_(QS_QEP_INTERN_TRAN, qs_id)
320 QS_TIME_PRE_(); // time stamp
321 QS_SIG_PRE_(e->sig); // the signal of the event
322 QS_OBJ_PRE_(this); // this state machine object
323 QS_FUN_PRE_(t->stateHandler); // the source state
324 QS_END_PRE_()
325 QS_MEM_APP();
326
327 QF_CRIT_EXIT();
328 }
329 // event bubbled to the 'top' state?
330 else if (t == nullptr) {
331 QS_CRIT_ENTRY();
332 QS_MEM_SYS();
333 QS_BEGIN_PRE_(QS_QEP_IGNORED, qs_id)
334 QS_TIME_PRE_(); // time stamp
335 QS_SIG_PRE_(e->sig); // the signal of the event
336 QS_OBJ_PRE_(this); // this state machine object
337 QS_FUN_PRE_(s->stateHandler); // the current state
338 QS_END_PRE_()
339 QS_MEM_APP();
340 QS_CRIT_EXIT();
341 }
342 #endif // Q_SPY
343 else {
344 // empty
345 }
346
347 #ifndef Q_UNSAFE
348 m_temp.uint = ~m_state.uint;
349 #endif
350}
351
352//${QEP::QMsm::isIn} .........................................................
353bool QMsm::isIn(QStateHandler const state) noexcept {
354 bool inState = false; // assume that this MSM is not in 'state'
355
356 QMState const *s = m_state.obj;
357 std::int_fast8_t limit = 6; // loop hard limit
358 for (; (s != nullptr) && (limit > 0); --limit) {
359 if (s->stateHandler == state) { // match found?
360 inState = true;
361 break;
362 }
363 else {
364 s = s->superstate; // advance to the superstate
365 }
366 }
367
368 QF_CRIT_STAT
369 QF_CRIT_ENTRY();
370 Q_ENSURE_INCRIT(690, limit > 0);
371 QF_CRIT_EXIT();
372
373 return inState;
374}
375
376//${QEP::QMsm::isInState} ....................................................
377bool QMsm::isInState(QMState const * const stateObj) const noexcept {
378 bool inState = false; // assume that this MSM is not in 'state'
379
380 QMState const *s = m_state.obj;
381 std::int_fast8_t limit = 6; // loop hard limit
382 for (; (s != nullptr) && (limit > 0); --limit) {
383 if (s == stateObj) { // match found?
384 inState = true;
385 break;
386 }
387 else {
388 s = s->superstate; // advance to the superstate
389 }
390 }
391
392 QF_CRIT_STAT
393 QF_CRIT_ENTRY();
394 Q_ENSURE_INCRIT(790, limit > 0);
395 QF_CRIT_EXIT();
396
397 return inState;
398}
399
400//${QEP::QMsm::childStateObj} ................................................
401QMState const * QMsm::childStateObj(QMState const * const parent) const noexcept {
402 QMState const *child = m_state.obj;
403 bool isFound = false; // start with the child not found
404 QMState const *s;
405
406 for (s = m_state.obj; s != nullptr; s = s->superstate) {
407 if (s == parent) {
408 isFound = true; // child is found
409 break;
410 }
411 else {
412 child = s;
413 }
414 }
415 if (!isFound) { // still not found?
416 for (s = m_temp.obj; s != nullptr; s = s->superstate) {
417 if (s == parent) {
418 isFound = true; // child is found
419 break;
420 }
421 else {
422 child = s;
423 }
424 }
425 }
426
427 QF_CRIT_STAT
428 QF_CRIT_ENTRY();
429 Q_ASSERT_INCRIT(890, isFound);
430 QF_CRIT_EXIT();
431
432 return child; // return the child
433}
434
435//${QEP::QMsm::execTatbl_} ...................................................
436QState QMsm::execTatbl_(
437 QMTranActTable const * const tatbl,
438 std::uint_fast8_t const qs_id)
439{
440 #ifndef Q_SPY
441 Q_UNUSED_PAR(qs_id);
442 #endif
443
444 QF_CRIT_STAT
445 QF_CRIT_ENTRY();
446 // precondition:
447 // - the tran-action table pointer must not be NULL
448 Q_REQUIRE_INCRIT(400, tatbl != nullptr);
449 QF_CRIT_EXIT();
450
451 QState r = Q_RET_NULL;
452 for (QActionHandler const *a = &tatbl->act[0]; *a != nullptr; ++a) {
453 r = (*(*a))(this); // call the action through the 'a' pointer
454 #ifdef Q_SPY
455 QS_CRIT_ENTRY();
456 QS_MEM_SYS();
457 if (r == Q_RET_ENTRY) {
458 QS_BEGIN_PRE_(QS_QEP_STATE_ENTRY, qs_id)
459 QS_OBJ_PRE_(this); // this state machine object
460 QS_FUN_PRE_(m_temp.obj->stateHandler); // entered state
461 QS_END_PRE_()
462 }
463 else if (r == Q_RET_EXIT) {
464 QS_BEGIN_PRE_(QS_QEP_STATE_EXIT, qs_id)
465 QS_OBJ_PRE_(this); // this state machine object
466 QS_FUN_PRE_(m_temp.obj->stateHandler); // exited state
467 QS_END_PRE_()
468 }
469 else if (r == Q_RET_TRAN_INIT) {
470 QS_BEGIN_PRE_(QS_QEP_STATE_INIT, qs_id)
471 QS_OBJ_PRE_(this); // this state machine object
472 QS_FUN_PRE_(tatbl->target->stateHandler); // source
473 QS_FUN_PRE_(m_temp.tatbl->target->stateHandler); // target
474 QS_END_PRE_()
475 }
476 else if (r == Q_RET_TRAN_EP) {
477 QS_BEGIN_PRE_(QS_QEP_TRAN_EP, qs_id)
478 QS_OBJ_PRE_(this); // this state machine object
479 QS_FUN_PRE_(tatbl->target->stateHandler); // source
480 QS_FUN_PRE_(m_temp.tatbl->target->stateHandler); // target
481 QS_END_PRE_()
482 }
483 else if (r == Q_RET_TRAN_XP) {
484 QS_BEGIN_PRE_(QS_QEP_TRAN_XP, qs_id)
485 QS_OBJ_PRE_(this); // this state machine object
486 QS_FUN_PRE_(tatbl->target->stateHandler); // source
487 QS_FUN_PRE_(m_temp.tatbl->target->stateHandler); // target
488 QS_END_PRE_()
489 }
490 else {
491 // empty
492 }
493 QS_MEM_APP();
494 QS_CRIT_EXIT();
495 #endif // Q_SPY
496 }
497
498 m_state.obj = (r >= Q_RET_TRAN)
499 ? m_temp.tatbl->target
500 : tatbl->target;
501 return r;
502}
503
504//${QEP::QMsm::exitToTranSource_} ............................................
505void QMsm::exitToTranSource_(
506 QMState const * const cs,
507 QMState const * const ts,
508 std::uint_fast8_t const qs_id)
509{
510 #ifndef Q_SPY
511 Q_UNUSED_PAR(qs_id);
512 #endif
513
514 QF_CRIT_STAT
515
516 // exit states from the current state to the tran. source state
517 QMState const *s = cs;
518 while (s != ts) {
519 // exit action provided in state 's'?
520 if (s->exitAction != nullptr) {
521 // execute the exit action
522 static_cast<void>((*s->exitAction)(this));
523
524 QS_CRIT_ENTRY();
525 QS_MEM_SYS();
526 QS_BEGIN_PRE_(QS_QEP_STATE_EXIT, qs_id)
527 QS_OBJ_PRE_(this); // this state machine object
528 QS_FUN_PRE_(s->stateHandler); // the exited state handler
529 QS_END_PRE_()
530 QS_MEM_APP();
531 QS_CRIT_EXIT();
532 }
533
534 s = s->superstate; // advance to the superstate
535
536 if (s == nullptr) { // reached the top of a submachine?
537 s = m_temp.obj; // the superstate from QM_SM_EXIT()
538 QF_CRIT_ENTRY();
539 Q_ASSERT_INCRIT(510, s != nullptr);
540 QF_CRIT_EXIT();
541 }
542 }
543}
544
545//${QEP::QMsm::enterHistory_} ................................................
546QState QMsm::enterHistory_(
547 QMState const * const hist,
548 std::uint_fast8_t const qs_id)
549{
550 #ifndef Q_SPY
551 Q_UNUSED_PAR(qs_id);
552 #endif
553
554 QMState const *s = hist;
555 QMState const *ts = m_state.obj; // tran. source
556 QMState const *epath[MAX_ENTRY_DEPTH_];
557
558 QF_CRIT_STAT
559
560 QS_CRIT_ENTRY();
561 QS_MEM_SYS();
562 QS_BEGIN_PRE_(QS_QEP_TRAN_HIST, qs_id)
563 QS_OBJ_PRE_(this); // this state machine object
564 QS_FUN_PRE_(ts->stateHandler); // source state handler
565 QS_FUN_PRE_(hist->stateHandler); // target state handler
566 QS_END_PRE_()
567 QS_MEM_APP();
568 QS_CRIT_EXIT();
569
570 std::int_fast8_t i = 0; // tran. entry path index
571 while (s != ts) {
572 if (s->entryAction != nullptr) {
573 QF_CRIT_ENTRY();
574 Q_ASSERT_INCRIT(620, i < MAX_ENTRY_DEPTH_);
575 QF_CRIT_EXIT();
576 epath[i] = s;
577 ++i;
578 }
579 s = s->superstate;
580 if (s == nullptr) {
581 ts = s; // force exit from the for-loop
582 }
583 }
584
585 // retrace the entry path in reverse (desired) order...
586 while (i > 0) {
587 --i;
588 (*epath[i]->entryAction)(this); // run entry action in epath[i]
589
590 QS_CRIT_ENTRY();
591 QS_MEM_SYS();
592 QS_BEGIN_PRE_(QS_QEP_STATE_ENTRY, qs_id)
593 QS_OBJ_PRE_(this);
594 QS_FUN_PRE_(epath[i]->stateHandler); // entered state handler
595 QS_END_PRE_()
596 QS_MEM_APP();
597 QS_CRIT_EXIT();
598 }
599
600 m_state.obj = hist; // set current state to the tran. target
601
602 // initial tran. present?
603 QState r;
604 if (hist->initAction != nullptr) {
605 r = (*hist->initAction)(this); // execute the tran. action
606 }
607 else {
608 r = Q_RET_NULL;
609 }
610
611 return r;
612}
613
614//${QEP::QMsm::topQMState} ...................................................
615QMState const * QMsm::topQMState() const noexcept {
616 return &l_msm_top_s;
617}

619} // namespace QP

Definition qp.hpp:231

QP::QEvt::verify_

Definition qp.hpp:171
